Hubs Hubs - 1

Topical Hubs ®

Build a digital encyclopedia on the go: fully automated, competitive intelligence hubs as a managed service.

Introduction

On one extreme of intelligence gathering are the search engines that enable a real-time search for gathering information on market & research landscape to facilitate decision making in diverse functions of a Biopharma such as Discovery, R&D, Clinical trial design, etc. However, the activity required to collate, structure, and synthesize the information in a format which is consumable for deriving insights and driving decision-making is time-consuming.

Our Solution

As the process of gathering intel for such use cases has certain repetitive elements, there is a scope for unlocking efficiencies in putting together this intel by leveraging the latest technologies in web mining, data pipelining and artificial intelligence.

  • Unlock efficiencies by leveraging the latest technology in web mining, data pipelining and AI
  • A Bot army that feeds off data sources and processes the information
  • Processed knowledge is updated in knowledge graph with relevant nodes and edges capturing key entities and their relationships
  • Automation helps with long term advantages, replicability and flexibility

Highlights

NLP

Utilize NLP to understand the text, domain ontology to consolidate information from multiple and diverse sources

Web Crawlers

Using crawlers and NLP to search the internet for relevant publicly available data

Insert Phrase Here

Enable alerts that mine global, local news as well as tweets for relevant insights

Insert Phrase Here

Monitoring updates to websites/databases of interest and subscriptions

Near Real Time Updates

In-built pull-based systems such as APIs for data sources where subscriptions are available, for near real-time updates

Structured Information

Structuring the information in graph database enabling the flexibility to continuously expand data ingestion sources

Benefits

  • Build disease hubs spanning Covid-19, Oncology, Alzheimer’s, Immunology, Hepatitis, Rare diseases
  • Derive valuable insights on competitive intelligence for informed decision making across functions
  • Scalable, reusable, and repeatable solution for large scale information consumption and collation
  • Successfully mine and organize public information in easily consumable format
  • Latest updates from research and market landscape with zero incremental resource deployment cost
